trans-unit.source: Specifies the location where security-related event logs are written.

When creating a [!INCLUDE[indigo1](~/includes/indigo1-md.md)] application that requires authentication and/or authorization of callers, you can specify that events related to security be recorded for either success, failure, or both.
trans-unit.target: 在建立需要呼叫端驗證與/或授權的 [!INCLUDE[indigo1](~/includes/indigo1-md.md)] 應用程式時，可以指定記錄成功、失敗或包含兩種狀況的安全性相關事件。

trans-unit.source: The location of the log is determined by this enumeration.
trans-unit.target: 記錄的位置是由此列舉所決定。

trans-unit.source: The level of the audit log is specified by setting the <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.ServiceSecurityAuditBehavior.MessageAuthenticationAuditLevel%2A> or the <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.ServiceSecurityAuditBehavior.ServiceAuthorizationAuditLevel%2A> property of the <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.ServiceSecurityAuditBehavior> class to one of the <xref:System.ServiceModel.AuditLevel> values.
trans-unit.target: 您可以將 <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.ServiceSecurityAuditBehavior.MessageAuthenticationAuditLevel%2A> 或 <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.ServiceSecurityAuditBehavior.ServiceAuthorizationAuditLevel%2A> 類別的 <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.ServiceSecurityAuditBehavior> 屬性設為其中一個 <xref:System.ServiceModel.AuditLevel> 值來指定稽核記錄的層級。

trans-unit.source: You can also specify audit behavior using the [<serviceSecurityAudit>](~/docs/framework/configure-apps/file-schema/wcf/servicesecurityaudit.md) binding.
trans-unit.target: 您也可以指定稽核行為使用[ <serviceSecurityAudit> ](~/docs/framework/configure-apps/file-schema/wcf/servicesecurityaudit.md)繫結。

trans-unit.source: If the <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.ServiceSecurityAuditBehavior.AuditLogLocation%2A> property is set to Security and `Audit Object Access` is not set in the `Local Security Policy`, audit events will not be written to the Security log.
trans-unit.target: 如果<xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.ServiceSecurityAuditBehavior.AuditLogLocation%2A>屬性設定為 安全性和`Audit Object Access`中未設定`Local Security Policy`，不會稽核事件寫入安全性記錄檔。

trans-unit.source: No failure is returned, but audit entries will not be written to the Security log.
trans-unit.target: 這時不會傳回任何失敗，但是稽核項目也不會寫入安全性記錄檔中。

trans-unit.source: In addition, the calling thread must have `SeAuditPrivilege` to be able to write to the Security log.
trans-unit.target: 此外，呼叫的執行緒必須具備 `SeAuditPrivilege` 才能寫入安全性記錄檔。
預設值視作業系統而定

trans-unit.source: When setting the property to the Default value, the operating system determines which log will actually be written to.
trans-unit.target: 時將屬性設定為預設值，作業系統會判斷記錄檔會實際寫入至。

trans-unit.source: The following example sets the <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.ServiceSecurityAuditBehavior.AuditLogLocation%2A> property to one of the <xref:System.ServiceModel.AuditLogLocation.Default> values.
trans-unit.target: 下列範例會將 <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.ServiceSecurityAuditBehavior.AuditLogLocation%2A> 屬性設為其中一個 <xref:System.ServiceModel.AuditLogLocation.Default> 值。

trans-unit.source: Specifies the Application log in the event log.
Specifies the default location, which is determined by the operating system.

If writing to the Security log is supported (such as on [!INCLUDE[wv](~/includes/wv-md.md)] and [!INCLUDE[ws2003](~/includes/ws2003-md.md)] and later platforms), the default log location is the Security log.
Otherwise (such as in [!INCLUDE[wxpsp2](~/includes/wxpsp2-md.md)]), the default log location is the Application log.
Specifies the Security log in the event log.
The calling thread must have <see langword="SeAuditPrivilege" /> to be able to write to the Security log.
